summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to accept for and on behalf of the City an "Amendment of Deed" amending that certain deed from the United States of America (recorded under King County Document No. 7512310378 and accepted by Ordinance 105244) conveying to the City approximately 193.6 acres of land in Sections 1, 2 and 11, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M. (known as a portion of Sand Point Naval Air Station) by deleting certain covenants of the City and amending the description of a reserved water intake supply line easement to effect its relocation.
